segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with a woman drying a plate so carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and seems completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look at the sink behind her, water is overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is still running, and there's a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already wet, but she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the side, there's a boy climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really unstable, like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and holding a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing there, reaching up as if begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, right behind the mom who has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a peaceful garden outside, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall into that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
